General_Description: '''Morality Issues''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Some philosophers and [[Courtesan|''hetaerae'']] got along well - and indeed some had business together - but one philosopher spoke against the women and needed to be sent a strong message.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
